Player History
Signed as a free agent by New York (Y) on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $2,548,000 per year...
Earned first career win on 4/30/1985...
Injured on 7/5/1985 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1986, going 4-1, 2.55...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Traded from New York (Y) to New York (M) on 8/1/1987 (Going to NYM: P Jack Morris. Going to NYY: P Julio Valera)...
8/17/1987: Signed a contract extension with New York (M), $7,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
Had first career hit (double) on 9/13/1987, off Joe Johnson (ATL)...
Traded from New York (M) to Chicago on 2/6/1988 (Going to CHC: P Jim Abbott, P Jack Morris, P Donnie Moore. Going to NYM: P Darren Holmes, 1B Reggie Jefferson)...
Injured on 4/16/1988 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Traded from Chicago to Montreal on 5/11/1989 (Going to MON: SS Mark McLemore, P Bobby Thigpen, P Arthur Rhodes, P Jack Morris. Going to CHC: LF Tim Raines)...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Chicago on 6/15/1989, striking out 10...
Injured on 7/10/1989 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 8 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/5/1990 to a 1-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 1990...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 2/9/1991 to a 2-year deal worth $3,800,000 per year...
Struck out 15 batters against Pittsburgh on 9/28/1992...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 3/3/1993 to a 1-year deal worth $3,562,500 per year...
